create table BCK_SCEN (
SCEN_NO <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10", "")?> NOT NULL ,
SCEN_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "400", "")?> NOT NULL ,
SCEN_VERSION <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "35", "")?> NOT NULL ,
I_PACKAGE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10", "")?> ,
TXT_SCEN <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "250", "")?> ,
IND_CHANGE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1", "")?> ,
EXT_VERSION <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "35", "")?> ,
FIRST_DATE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_DATE", "", "")?> ,
FIRST_USER <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "35", "")?> ,
LAST_USER <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "35", "")?> ,
LAST_DATE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_DATE", "", "")?> ,
IND_PROMPT_PARAM <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1", "")?> ,
I_POP <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10", "")?> ,
I_TRT <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10", "")?> ,
I_VAR <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10", "")?> ,
I_TXT_SCEN <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "19", "")?> ,
I_SCEN_FOLDER <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10", "")?> ,
INT_VERSION <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10", "")?> ,
V_LAST_DATE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_DATE", "", "")?>
)

insert into BCK_SCEN (
SCEN_NO ,
SCEN_NAME ,
SCEN_VERSION ,
I_PACKAGE ,
TXT_SCEN ,
IND_CHANGE ,
EXT_VERSION ,
FIRST_DATE ,
FIRST_USER ,
LAST_USER ,
LAST_DATE ,
IND_PROMPT_PARAM ,
I_POP ,
I_TRT ,
I_VAR ,
I_TXT_SCEN ,
I_SCEN_FOLDER
) select
SCEN_NO ,
SCEN_NAME ,
SCEN_VERSION ,
I_PACKAGE ,
TXT_SCEN ,
IND_CHANGE ,
EXT_VERSION ,
FIRST_DATE ,
FIRST_USER ,
LAST_USER ,
LAST_DATE ,
IND_PROMPT_PARAM ,
I_POP ,
I_TRT ,
I_VAR ,
I_TXT_SCEN ,
I_SCEN_FOLDER
from SNP_SCEN
drop table SNP_SCEN
rename table BCK_SCEN to SNP_SCEN

alter table SNP_EXP_TXT add constraint PK_EXP_TXT primary key ( I_TXT , TXT_ORD )
alter table SNP_EXP_TXT_HEADER add constraint PK_EXP_TXT_HEADER primary key ( I_TXT )
alter table SNP_ID add constraint PK_ID primary key ( ID_SEQ , ID_TBL )
alter table SNP_LOCKED_OBJECT add constraint PK_LOCKED_OBJECT primary key ( I_INSTANCE , I_OBJECT )
alter table SNP_LOC_REPW add constraint PK_LOC_REPW primary key ( REP_SHORT_ID )
alter table SNP_PLAN_AGENT add constraint PK_PLAN_AGENT primary key ( I_PLAN_AGENT )
alter table SNP_SCEN add constraint PK_SCEN primary key ( SCEN_NO )
alter table SNP_SCEN_FOLDER add constraint PK_SCEN_FOLDER primary key ( I_SCEN_FOLDER )
alter table SNP_SCEN_REPORT add constraint PK_SCEN_REPORT primary key ( SCEN_NO , SCEN_RUN_NO )
alter table SNP_SCEN_STEP add constraint PK_SCEN_STEP primary key ( SCEN_NO , NNO )
alter table SNP_SCEN_TASK add constraint PK_SCEN_TASK primary key ( SCEN_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO )
alter table SNP_SCEN_TXT add constraint PK_SCEN_TXT primary key ( SCEN_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO , ORD_TYPE , TXT_ORD )

alter table SNP_SEQ_SCEN add constraint PK_SEQ_SCEN primary key ( SCEN_NO , SEQ_NAME )

alter table SNP_SESS_FOLDER add constraint PK_SESS_FOLDER primary key ( I_SESS_FOLDER )
alter table SNP_SESS_STEP add constraint PK_SESS_STEP primary key ( SESS_NO , NNO )
alter table SNP_SESS_TASK add constraint PK_SESS_TASK primary key ( SESS_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO )

alter table SNP_SESS_TXT_LOG add constraint PK_SESS_TXT_LOG primary key ( SESS_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO , TXT_ORD , TXT_TYPE , NB_RUN )
alter table SNP_FF_VALUEE add constraint PK_SNP_FF_VALUEE primary key ( FF_CODE , I_INSTANCE )
alter table SNP_LOCK add constraint PK_SNP_LOCK primary key ( LOCK_ID )
alter table SNP_STEP_LOG add constraint PK_STEP_LOG primary key ( NNO , SESS_NO , NB_RUN )
alter table SNP_STEP_REPORT add constraint PK_STEP_REPORT primary key ( SCEN_NO , SCEN_RUN_NO , NNO , NB_RUN )
alter table SNP_TASK_TXT add constraint PK_TASK_TXT primary key ( SESS_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO , ORD_TYPE , TXT_ORD )
alter table SNP_VAR_DATA add constraint PK_VAR_DATA primary key ( VAR_NAME , CONTEXT_CODE , I_VAL )
alter table SNP_VAR_PLAN_AGENT add constraint PK_VAR_PLAN_AGENT primary key ( I_PLAN_AGENT , VAR_NAME )
alter table SNP_VAR_SCEN add constraint PK_VAR_SCEN primary key ( SCEN_NO , VAR_NAME )
alter table SNP_VAR_SESS add constraint PK_VAR_SESS primary key ( SESS_NO , VAR_NAME )
alter table SNP_SCEN add constraint AK_SCEN unique ( SCEN_NAME , SCEN_VERSION )
alter table SNP_SCEN_FOLDER add constraint AK_SCEN_FOLDER unique ( PAR_I_SCEN_FOLDER , SCEN_FOLDER_NAME )
alter table SNP_SESS_FOLDER add constraint AK_SESS_FOLDER unique ( FOLDER_NAME )
create index SNP_SCEN_FK1 on SNP_SCEN ( I_SCEN_FOLDER )
create index SCEN_REPORT_FK1 on SNP_SCEN_REPORT ( SCEN_NO )
create index SCEN_STEP_FK1 on SNP_SCEN_STEP ( SCEN_NO )
create index SCEN_TASK_FK1 on SNP_SCEN_TASK ( SCEN_NO , NNO )
create index SCEN_TXT_FK1 on SNP_SCEN_TXT ( SCEN_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO )
create index SEQ_SCEN_FK1 on SNP_SEQ_SCEN ( SCEN_NO )
create index SEQ_SESS_FK1 on SNP_SEQ_SESS ( SESS_NO )
create index SESS_STEP_FK1 on SNP_SESS_STEP ( SESS_NO )
create index SESS_TASK_FK1 on SNP_SESS_TASK ( SESS_NO , NNO )
create index SESS_TASK_LOG_FK1 on SNP_SESS_TASK_LOG ( NNO , SESS_NO , NB_RUN )
create index SESS_TXT_LOG_FK1 on SNP_SESS_TXT_LOG ( SESS_NO , NNO , NB_RUN , SCEN_TASK_NO )
create index VAR_PLAN_AGENT_FK1 on SNP_VAR_PLAN_AGENT ( I_PLAN_AGENT )
create index STEP_LOG_FK1 on SNP_STEP_LOG ( SESS_NO , NNO )
create index STEP_REPORT_FK1 on SNP_STEP_REPORT ( SCEN_NO , SCEN_RUN_NO )
create index TASK_TXT_FK1 on SNP_TASK_TXT ( SESS_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO )
create index VAR_SCEN_FK1 on SNP_VAR_SCEN ( SCEN_NO )
create index VAR_SESS_FK1 on SNP_VAR_SESS ( SESS_NO )
alter table SNP_SCEN add constraint FK_SCEN_FOLDER foreign key ( I_SCEN_FOLDER ) references SNP_SCEN_FOLDER ( I_SCEN_FOLDER )
alter table SNP_SCEN_REPORT add constraint FK_SCEN_REPORT foreign key ( SCEN_NO ) references SNP_SCEN ( SCEN_NO )
alter table SNP_SCEN_STEP add constraint FK_SCEN_STEP foreign key ( SCEN_NO ) references SNP_SCEN ( SCEN_NO )
alter table SNP_SCEN_TASK add constraint FK_SCEN_TASK foreign key ( SCEN_NO , NNO ) references SNP_SCEN_STEP ( SCEN_NO , NNO )
alter table SNP_SCEN_TXT add constraint FK_SCEN_TXT foreign key ( SCEN_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO ) references SNP_SCEN_TASK ( SCEN_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO )
alter table SNP_SEQ_SCEN add constraint FK_SEQ_SCEN foreign key ( SCEN_NO ) references SNP_SCEN ( SCEN_NO )
alter table SNP_SEQ_SESS add constraint FK_SEQ_SESS foreign key ( SESS_NO ) references SNP_SESSION ( SESS_NO )
alter table SNP_SESS_STEP add constraint FK_SESS_STEP foreign key ( SESS_NO ) references SNP_SESSION ( SESS_NO )
alter table SNP_SESS_TASK add constraint FK_SESS_TASK foreign key ( SESS_NO , NNO ) references SNP_SESS_STEP ( SESS_NO , NNO )
alter table SNP_SESS_TASK_LOG add constraint FK_SESS_TASK_LOG foreign key ( NNO , SESS_NO , NB_RUN ) references SNP_STEP_LOG ( NNO , SESS_NO , NB_RUN )
alter table SNP_SESS_TXT_LOG add constraint FK_SESS_TXT_LOG foreign key ( SESS_NO , NNO , NB_RUN , SCEN_TASK_NO ) references SNP_SESS_TASK_LOG ( SESS_NO , NNO , NB_RUN , SCEN_TASK_NO )
alter table SNP_VAR_PLAN_AGENT add constraint FK_SNP_PLAN_AGENT foreign key ( I_PLAN_AGENT ) references SNP_PLAN_AGENT ( I_PLAN_AGENT )
alter table SNP_STEP_LOG add constraint FK_STEP_LOG foreign key ( SESS_NO , NNO ) references SNP_SESS_STEP ( SESS_NO , NNO )
alter table SNP_STEP_REPORT add constraint FK_STEP_REPORT foreign key ( SCEN_NO , SCEN_RUN_NO ) references SNP_SCEN_REPORT ( SCEN_NO , SCEN_RUN_NO )
alter table SNP_TASK_TXT add constraint FK_TASK_TXT foreign key ( SESS_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO ) references SNP_SESS_TASK ( SESS_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO )
alter table SNP_VAR_SCEN add constraint FK_VAR_SCEN foreign key ( SCEN_NO ) references SNP_SCEN ( SCEN_NO )
alter table SNP_VAR_SESS add constraint FK_VAR_SESS foreign key ( SESS_NO ) references SNP_SESSION ( SESS_NO )
